channel.title: CVE Feed for dFactory -- Responsive Lightbox
channel.description: The latest CVEs for dFactory -- Responsive Lightbox

item.title: CVE-2024-43924|2024-10-23T07:31:20.699Z -- dfactory -- responsive%20lightbox
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in dFactory Responsive Lightbox allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Responsive Lightbox: from n/a through 2.4.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-49282|2024-10-17T19:14:28.010Z -- dfactory -- responsive%20lightbox
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in dFactory Responsive Lightbox allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Responsive Lightbox: from n/a through 2.4.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-31252|2024-08-02T01:46:04.994Z -- dfactory -- responsive%20lightbox
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in dFactory Responsive Lightbox.This issue affects Responsive Lightbox: from n/a through 2.4.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-31252|2024-06-09T11:12:04.084Z -- dfactory -- responsive%20lightbox
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in dFactory Responsive Lightbox.This issue affects Responsive Lightbox: from n/a through 2.4.6.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in dFactory Responsive Lightbox.This issue affects Responsive Lightbox: from n/a through 2.4.6.
